From Wiktionary, the free dictionary

Catalan

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin explicāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): (Central, Balearic) [əks.pliˈka]
  • IPA(key): (Valencia) [eks.pliˈkaɾ]
  • Audio (Catalonia):(file)
  • Rhymes: -a(ɾ)

Verb

[edit]

explicar (first-person singular present explico, first-person singular preterite expliquí, past participle explicat)(transitive)

  1. to explain
  2. to tell, to narrate (a story)
    Synonym: (less common) contar

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of explicar (first conjugation, c-qu alternation)
infinitive explicar
gerund explicant
past participle masculine feminine
singular explicat explicada
plural explicats explicades
person singular plural
first second third first second third
indicative jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present explico expliques explica expliquem expliqueu expliquen
imperfect explicava explicaves explicava explicàvem explicàveu explicaven
future explicaré explicaràs explicarà explicarem explicareu explicaran
preterite expliquí explicares explicà explicàrem explicàreu explicaren
conditional explicaria explicaries explicaria explicaríem explicaríeu explicarien
subjunctive jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present expliqui expliquis expliqui expliquem expliqueu expliquin
imperfect expliqués expliquessis expliqués expliquéssim expliquéssiu expliquessin
imperative — tu vostè nosaltres vosaltres
vós 		vostès
affirmative — explica expliqui expliquem expliqueu expliquin
negative (no) — no expliquis no expliqui no expliquem no expliqueu no expliquin

Related terms

[edit]
  • explic
  • explicable
  • explicació
  • explicador
  • explicatiu

Further reading

[edit]
  • “explicar”, in Diccionari de la llengua catalana [Dictionary of the Catalan Language] (in Catalan), second edition, Institute of Catalan Studies [Catalan: Institut d'Estudis Catalans], April 2007
  • “explicar”, in Gran Diccionari de la Llengua Catalana, Grup Enciclopèdia Catalana, 2025
  • “explicar” in Diccionari normatiu valencià, Acadèmia Valenciana de la Llengua.
  • “explicar” in Diccionari català-valencià-balear, Antoni Maria Alcover and Francesc de Borja Moll, 1962.

Galician

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Learned borrowing from Latin explicāre.

Verb

[edit]

explicar (first-person singular present explico, first-person singular preterite expliquei, past participle explicado)

  1. to explain

Conjugation

[edit]

[edit]
  • explicable
  • explicación

[edit]

  • “explicar”, in Dicionário Estraviz de galego (in Galician), 2014–2025

Interlingua

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From Latin explicāre.

Verb

[edit]

explicar

  1. to explain

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of explicar
infinitive explicar
participle present perfect
explicante explicate
active simple perfect
present explica ha explicate
past explicava habeva explicate
future explicara habera explicate
conditional explicarea haberea explicate
imperative explica —
passive simple perfect
present es explicate ha essite explicate
past esseva explicate habeva essite explicate
future essera explicate habera essite explicate
conditional esserea explicate haberea essite explicate
imperative sia explicate —

Occitan

[edit]

Alternative forms

[edit]
  • esplicar (misspelling)

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin explicāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • Audio (Béarn):(file)

Verb

[edit]

explicar (Languedoc, Limousin, Provençal)

  1. to explain

Portuguese

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin explicāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
 
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /is.pliˈka(ʁ)/ [is.pliˈka(h)], /es.pliˈka(ʁ)/ [es.pliˈka(h)]
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /is.pliˈka(ʁ)/ [is.pliˈka(h)], /es.pliˈka(ʁ)/ [es.pliˈka(h)]
    • (São Paulo) IPA(key): /is.pliˈka(ɾ)/, /es.pliˈka(ɾ)/
    • (Rio de Janeiro) IPA(key): /iʃ.pliˈka(ʁ)/ [iʃ.pliˈka(χ)], /eʃ.pliˈka(ʁ)/ [eʃ.pliˈka(χ)]
    • (Southern Brazil) IPA(key): /es.pliˈka(ɻ)/
 
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /(i)ʃ.pliˈkaɾ/, /ɐjʃ.pliˈkaɾ/
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /(i)ʃ.pliˈkaɾ/, /ɐjʃ.pliˈkaɾ/
    • (Northern Portugal) IPA(key): /(i)ʃ.pliˈkaɾ/, /ejʃ.pliˈkaɾ/
    • (Central Portugal) IPA(key): /(i)ʃ.pliˈkaɾ/, /ejʃ.pliˈkaɾ/
    • (Southern Portugal) IPA(key): /(i)ʃ.pliˈka.ɾi/, /eʃ.pliˈka.ɾi/

  • Audio (Portugal):(file)
  • Audio (Portugal):(file)
  • Audio (Portugal (Porto)):(file)
  • Hyphenation: ex‧pli‧car

Verb

[edit]

explicar (first-person singular present explico, first-person singular preterite expliquei, past participle explicado)

  1. (transitive) to explain
    Synonym: (less common) explanar

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of explicar (c-qu alternation) (See Appendix:Portuguese verbs)

First-person
(eu) 		Second-person
(tu) 		Third-person
(ele / ela / você) 		First-person
(nós) 		Second-person
(vós) 		Third-person
(eles / elas / vocês)

explicando
Past participle
Masculine explicado explicados
Feminine explicada explicadas
Indicative
Present explico explicas explica explicamos explicais explicam
Imperfect explicava explicavas explicava explicávamos explicáveis explicavam
Preterite expliquei explicaste explicou explicamos1, explicámos2 explicastes explicaram
Pluperfect explicara explicaras explicara explicáramos explicáreis explicaram
Future explicarei explicarás explicará explicaremos explicareis explicarão
Conditional explicaria explicarias explicaria explicaríamos explicaríeis explicariam
Subjunctive
Present explique expliques explique expliquemos expliqueis expliquem
Imperfect explicasse explicasses explicasse explicássemos explicásseis explicassem

Negative (não) não expliques não explique não expliquemos não expliqueis não expliquem

1Brazilian Portuguese.
2European Portuguese.

Related terms

[edit]
  • explicação
  • explicador
  • explicável

Further reading

[edit]
  • “explicar”, in Dicionário Priberam da Língua Portuguesa (in Portuguese), Lisbon: Priberam, 2008–2025

Spanish

[edit]

Alternative forms

[edit]
  • esplicar (eye dialect, colloquial)

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin explicāre.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /eɡspliˈkaɾ/ [eɣ̞s.pliˈkaɾ]
  • IPA(key): /espliˈkaɾ/ [es.pliˈkaɾ] (common)
    • Audio (Colombia); [eh.pliˈkaɾ]:(file)
  • Rhymes: -aɾ
  • Syllabification: ex‧pli‧car

Verb

[edit]

explicar (first-person singular present explico, first-person singular preterite expliqué, past participle explicado)

  1. (transitive) to explain
  2. (reflexive) to explain to oneself

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of explicar (c-qu alternation) (See Appendix:Spanish verbs)
infinitive explicar
gerund explicando
past participle masculine feminine
singular explicado explicada
plural explicados explicadas
singular plural
1st person 2nd person 3rd person 1st person 2nd person 3rd person
indicative yo tú
vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ellos/ellas
ustedes

explicásvos 		explica explicamos explicáis explican

future explicaré explicarás explicará explicaremos explicaréis explicarán
conditional explicaría explicarías explicaría explicaríamos explicaríais explicarían
subjunctive yo tú
vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros

vosotras 		ellos/ellas

present explique expliquestú

imperfect
(se) 		explicase explicases explicase explicásemos explicaseis explicasen

imperative — tú
vos 		usted nosotros

affirmative explicatú
explicávos 		explique expliquemos explicad expliquen
negative no expliques no explique no expliquemos no expliquéis no expliquen

1Mostly obsolete, now mainly used in legal language.
2Argentine and Uruguayan voseo prefers the tú form for the present subjunctive.

    Selected combined forms of explicar (c-qu alternation)

These forms are generated automatically and may not actually be used. Pronoun usage varies by region.

singular plural
1st person 2nd person 3rd person 1st person 2nd person 3rd person
with infinitive explicar dative explicarme explicarte explicarle, explicarse explicarnos explicaros explicarles, explicarse
accusative explicarme explicarte explicarlo, explicarla, explicarse explicarnos explicaros explicarlos, explicarlas, explicarse
with gerund explicando dative explicándome explicándote explicándole, explicándose explicándonos explicándoos explicándoles, explicándose
accusative explicándome explicándote explicándolo, explicándola, explicándose explicándonos explicándoos explicándolos, explicándolas, explicándose
with informal second-person singular tú imperative explica dative explícame explícate explícale explícanos not used explícales
accusative explícame explícate explícalo, explícala explícanos not used explícalos, explícalas
with informal second-person singular vos imperative explicá dative explicame explicate explicale explicanos not used explicales
accusative explicame explicate explicalo, explicala explicanos not used explicalos, explicalas
with formal second-person singular imperative explique dative explíqueme not used explíquele, explíquese explíquenos not used explíqueles
accusative explíqueme not used explíquelo, explíquela, explíquese explíquenos not used explíquelos, explíquelas
with first-person plural imperative expliquemos dative not used expliquémoste expliquémosle expliquémonos expliquémoos expliquémosles
accusative not used expliquémoste expliquémoslo, expliquémosla expliquémonos expliquémoos expliquémoslos, expliquémoslas
with informal second-person plural imperative explicad dative explicadme not used explicadle explicadnos explicaos explicadles
accusative explicadme not used explicadlo, explicadla explicadnos explicaos explicadlos, explicadlas
with formal second-person plural imperative expliquen dative explíquenme not used explíquenle explíquennos not used explíquenles, explíquense
accusative explíquenme not used explíquenlo, explíquenla explíquennos not used explíquenlos, explíquenlas, explíquense

present me explico te explicastú
te explicásvos 		se explica nos explicamos os explicáis se explican
imperfect me explicaba te explicabas se explicaba nos explicábamos os explicabais se explicaban
preterite me expliqué te explicaste se explicó nos explicamos os explicasteis se explicaron
future me explicaré te explicarás se explicará nos explicaremos os explicaréis se explicarán
conditional me explicaría te explicarías se explicaría nos explicaríamos os explicaríais se explicarían

vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros

ustedes
present me explique te expliquestú

imperfect
(ra) 		me explicara te explicaras se explicara nos explicáramos os explicarais se explicaran
imperfect
(se) 		me explicase te explicases se explicase nos explicásemos os explicaseis se explicasen
future1 me explicare te explicares se explicare nos explicáremos os explicareis se explicaren
imperative — tú
vos 		usted nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ustedes
affirmative explícatetú
explicatevos 		explíquese expliquémonos explicaos explíquense
negative no te expliques no se explique no nos expliquemos no os expliquéis no se expliquen

1Mostly obsolete, now mainly used in legal language.
2Argentine and Uruguayan voseo prefers the tú form for the present subjunctive.
